00010 #ifndef UTIL_H

00013 #include <osg/Matrix>
00014 #include <vmmlib/matrix4.h>
00015 
00021 inline osg::Matrix vmmlToOsg( vmml::Matrix4f matrix )
00022 {
00023     return osg::Matrix( matrix.getElement( 0, 0 ), matrix.getElement( 1, 0 ) , matrix.getElement( 2, 0 ), matrix.getElement( 3, 0 ),
00024                         matrix.getElement( 0, 1 ), matrix.getElement( 1, 1 ) , matrix.getElement( 2, 1 ), matrix.getElement( 3, 1 ),
00025                         matrix.getElement( 0, 2 ), matrix.getElement( 1, 2 ) , matrix.getElement( 2, 2 ), matrix.getElement( 3, 2 ),
00026                         matrix.getElement( 0, 3 ), matrix.getElement( 1, 3 ) , matrix.getElement( 2, 3 ), matrix.getElement( 3, 3 ) );
00027 }
00028 
00029 
00030 inline vmml::Vector3<float> orthographicVector( const vmml::Vector3<float> &vector )
00031 {
00032     vmml::Vector3<float> result;
00033     float x = vector.x;
00034     float z = vector.z;
00035     result.x = z;
00036     result.z = -x;
00037     result.y = 0;
00038     return result;
00039 }
00040 
00044 inline vmml::Vector3<float> norm( const vmml::Vector3<float> &vector )
00045 {
00046     float length = sqrt( vector.x * vector.x + vector.y * vector.y
00047                                   + vector.z * vector.z );
00048     return ( vector / length );
00049 }
00050 #endif
